PageImageLoader - Class in com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer
The ImageLoader in charge of loading the external files, this is especially created to make the whole game modular so that the load of files will be facilitated and inspected at one place.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
PageImageLoader() - Constructor for class com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer.PageImageLoader
Constructor of the PageImageLoader, this constructor is intended for the ArrayList Image when it initializes the ArrayList and load the photos sequently into the Arrarlist using for loop
PageImageLoaderUtilities - Class in com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer
The ImageLoader facilitates the load of page images.
Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
PageImageLoaderUtilities() - Constructor for class com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer.PageImageLoaderUtilities

Projectile - Class in com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements
The Projectile class handles the projectiles being shot from a Hero or an Enemy.
It extends MovingObject.
The type of the projectile determines whether a Hero or an Enemy will be hurt, along with different property.
Projectile(InteractableWorld, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements.Projectile
Constructor that takes the coordinates of x and y of the projectile shot by a Hero or an Enemy
Projectile(InteractableWorld, int, int, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.movingelements.Projectile
Constructor that takes the coordinates of x and y of the projectile shot by a Boss from Enemy

projectiles - Variable in class com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.world.WorldElements
 
ProjectileUpdater - Class in com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.features.updater
A subclass of GeneralLocationUpdater which extends it to illustrate the Projectile location updater.
This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
ProjectileUpdater(MovingObject, InteractableWorld) - Constructor for class com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.features.updater.ProjectileUpdater
